mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_jinlong_system_user_examine ( user_id, examine_user_id, examine_time, is_pass, description, state ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{examineUserId}, #{examineTime}, #{pass}, #{description}, #{state} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE tbl_jinlong_system_user_examine
examine_user_id = #{examineUserId},
examine_time = #{examineTime},
is_pass = #{pass},
description = #{description},
state = #{state}
user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select:
SELECT user_id AS userId, examine_user_id AS examineUserId, examine_time AS examineTime, is_pass AS pass, description AS description, state AS state FROM tbl_jinlong_system_user_examine
user_id = #{id}

SELECT user_id AS userId, examine_user_id AS examineUserId, examine_time AS examineTime, is_pass AS pass, description AS description, state AS state FROM tbl_jinlong_system_user_examine ORDER BY user_id

SELECT user_id AS userId, examine_user_id AS examineUserId, examine_time AS examineTime, is_pass AS pass, description AS description, state AS state FROM tbl_jinlong_system_user_examine ORDER BY user_id DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT user_id AS userId, examine_user_id AS examineUserId, examine_time AS examineTime, is_pass AS pass, description AS description, state AS state FROM tbl_jinlong_system_user_examine ORDER BY user_id DESC LIMIT #{count}
